articles.author: Lauren Forristal
articles.title: X continues to bet on vertical video with its latest update - TechCrunch
articles.description: X's new immersive video player is designed to offer a more mobile-friendly experience, optimized especially for portrait-oriented videos.
articles.content:
X recently introduced a new immersive video player, signaling another major step in its ongoing push into video-focused experiences. 
Nikita Bier, Xs head of product, announced the update earlier th… [+2044 chars]
